**Example 1: 恢复快照实例**



Input: 

```
tccli vpc ResumeSnapshotInstance --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --SnapshotPolicyId sspolicy-aart89ip \
    --SnapshotFileId ssfile-emtabuwu2z \
    --InstanceId sg-ntrgm89v
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "a38579de-a046-4d68-b24a-b629c8d0ae57"
    }
}
```
